attributes.action: Make it mandatory for doctors to advise patient's families of Do Not Resuscitat Orderse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for doctors who issue Do Not Resuscitate Orders with respect to their patients to advise the patients family member(s) of the order and the reason for it; or  unequivocally declare that it is a Family Right under the Human Rights Act 1998 for families to be so informed except where it can conclusively shown that the patient is opposed to it.
